pages.title: A Cursed Stalker
pages.text: The Wendigo is a terrifying, cursed being that lurks in the dark, stalking its prey. It is said to be the result of a human who consumed flesh and became cursed.

pages.title: Abilities
pages.text: The Wendigo is incredibly fast, able to vanish into the shadows and reappear when least expected. It applies Hunger and Slowness when it strikes its prey.

pages.title: Weaknesses
pages.text: While powerful, Wendigos are vulnerable to fire and sunlight. They become slower and weaker when exposed to light.

pages.title: Summoning
pages.text: Wendigos can be found in cold, cursed biomes, or summoned using their spawn egg.
